about_app_description: Discover Kazakhstan’s culture and history with Sayahat.
about_description: Sayahat App is a mobile guide to historical, cultural and religious sites across Kazakhstan.
feature_map_desc: View all tourist locations on the map, search any city and open details instantly.
feature_info_desc: History, description, rules and verified data from official sources.
feature_route_desc: Walking and driving routes with closest reachable point detection.
feature_lang_desc: All content available in Kazakh, Russian and English.
feature_extra_desc: Push notifications and automatic nearby place detection.
audio_desc: Professionally narrated audio content in 3 languages.
howto_step1: Open the app and choose your language.
howto_step2: Browse nearby locations on the map.
howto_step3: Tap any place to read the description or listen to the audio guide.
howto_step4: Select route type: walking or driving.
howto_step5: Start navigation and enjoy exploring Kazakhstan.
onboard_desc_1: Search any city, building, or location — Sayahat instantly finds it on the map. Finding places is now easier than ever.
onboard_title_2: Get Accurate Information About Every Place
onboard_desc_2: Tap any building or landmark to see details — history, rules, opening hours, and important facts all in one place.
onboard_desc_3: Sayahat creates the best walking or driving route for you. Travel faster and more comfortably with smart navigation.
onboard_desc_4: Listen to audio guides in Kazakh, Russian, and English. Learn about places in a fun and accessible way.
enterEmailPassword: Enter your email and password to continue
password_min_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
sign_up_with_email: Sign up with your email and password
email_badly_formatted: The email address is badly formatted
enter_email_for_reset: Enter your email and we will send you a reset link.
email_already_in_use: Email address is already in use by another account
email_and_current_password_info: Enter your email and current password to set a new one.
failed_to_delete_photo: Failed to delete photo on server
verification_email_sent: We have sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox, and also check your spam folder if you don’t see it.
delete_account_warning: This action is permanent. Please enter your email and password to confirm.
